{"id":1009835443,"question_id":345,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1690937277,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"10 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1009835443/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"9.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        unordered_set<char> vowels = {'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U'};\n        vector<int> p, v;\n\n        int N = (int)s.size();\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            if (vowels.count(s[i])) {\n                v.push_back(s[i]);\n                p.push_back(i);\n            }\n        }\n        reverse(v.begin(), v.end());\n        int cnt = -1;\n        for (int i : p) {\n            cnt++;\n            s[i] = v[cnt];\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
